section.title: GetClusterList
section.para: GetClusterList returns all clusters as list objects.

listitem.para: Output: ClusterList as an array. List object contains name and ID properties.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate GetClusterList usage:

example.title: GetClusterList WSDL
example.programlisting:
<message name="GetClusterList"> <part name="emsGuid" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="GetClusterListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..ClusterListArray"/> </message>
<xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..ClusterList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: GetClusterList Output (Windows PowerShell)
example.screen:
Clusters:
id : 1 name : Testing-Production Cluster
id : 2 name : Development-Production Cluster
